document.full_text: no one is sure what causes multiple sclerosis, but a preliminary study out monday hints that a combination of low sun exposure and the "kissing disease" mononucleosis could raise a person's risk for the condition.
document.title: sun exposure, mono linked to multiple sclerosis
lines_and_colors: no one is sure what causes multiple sclerosis, but a preliminary study out monday hints that a combination of low sun exposure and the "kissing disease" mononucleosis could raise a person's risk for the condition.
